ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates the Modifiers API to create Text, Line, Box, LineArrow and Custom Annotations dynamically.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Using the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.ChartModifiers.AnnotationCreationModifier.html']AnnotationCreationModifier[/url] you can give your users the ability to create annotations dynamically via mouse-clicks.
[b][i]Tips![/i][/b]
To create [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Annotations.TextAnnotation.html']TextAnnotations[/url], [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Annotations.AxisMarkerAnnotation.html']AxisMarkerAnnotations[/url], [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Annotations.CustomAnnotation.html']CustomAnnotations[/url], - [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Annotations.HorizontalLineAnnotation.html']HorizontalLineAnnotations[/url] and - [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Annotations.VerticalLineAnnotation.html']VerticalLineAnnotations[/url], simply click once.
To create [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Annotations.BoxAnnotation.html']BoxAnnotations[/url], [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Annotations.LineAnnotation.html']LineAnnotations[/url] and [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Annotations.LineArrowAnnotation.html']LineArrowAnnotations[/url] click and drag.
After creating and selecting an annotation, you can drag, resize and delete it.
